funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.dsp.toolbox

Class YIN

  • java.lang.Object
    • funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.dsp.toolbox.YIN

  • public class YIN
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of the YIN Pitch Detection Algorithm (PDA)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      YIN(int size)
      Constructs a new YIN object to estimate the pitch (fundamental frequency) of sample buffers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float YINpitch(float[] buffer, int sampleRate)
      Returns a pitch value in Hz or -1 if no pitch is detected

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • YIN

        public YIN(int size)
        Constructs a new YIN object to estimate the pitch (fundamental frequency) of sample buffers
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the sample buffers that will be passed to this YIN object

    • Method Detail

      • YINpitch

        public float YINpitch(float[] buffer,
                      int sampleRate)
        Returns a pitch value in Hz or -1 if no pitch is detected
        Parameters:
        buffer - the sample buffer to analyze
        sampleRate - the sample rate of the audio in the buffer
        Returns:
        a pitch value in Hz or -1 if no pitch is detected.
